name: Energy Mine
description: Create a mine of pure energy that detonates 3x, dealing lethal damage.

major.name: Scatter
major.description: The energy mine will split into 3 mines that scatter & detonate 1 time each.

major.name: Turret
major.description: Instead of detonating, energy mine becomes a turret that shoots target one at a time.

major.name: Carousel
major.description: 3 energy mines will float around you, detonating when an enemy is nearby.

minor.name: Frequency Boost
minor.description: Increase detonation count & duration of energy mine.

minor.name: Siren
minor.description: Energy mine now attracts nearby normal enemies for a short time.

name: Frenzied Guard
description: Repair armor to full & force all enemies in the area to temporarily target you. Armor takes all damage during this time & kills repair armor.

major.name: Phalanx
major.description: Allies can also repair armor from kills while near you.

major.name: Retribution
major.description: Trigger an explosion on activation. Normal enemies that melee you are damaged & knocked down.

minor.name: Rally
minor.description: On activation, repair all nearby allies' armor to full

name: Dark Flare
description: Generate an energy beam that deals lethal shadow damage & penetrates everything in its path.

major.name: Supernova
major.description: The beam is replaced with a sphere that damages nearby enemies as it travels. The ball detonates at the end of Dark flares duration.

major.name: Dark Pact
major.description: Beam heals & revives other players on contact.

minor.name: Broad Beam
minor.description: Significantly increases the size of the beam.

minor.name: Heavy Shadow
minor.description: The beam slows enemies on contact.

major.name: Resilience
major.description: All affected players have their health regen delay reduced & their rate of healing increased temporarily.

major.name: Enduring Radiance
major.description: The beams & their healing effects persist for a short time after leaving the area of effect.

major.name: Persistence
major.description: Revived players keep all perks on their bleed-out bar.

minor.name: Inner Strength
minor.description: Affected player damage is slightly increased for a short time.

minor.name: Protection
minor.description: Healed players have damage slightly mitigated for a short time.

minor.name: Stoic Presence
minor.description: On activation, special & elite enemies are stunned while normal enemies are knocked down.

name: Aether Shroud
description: Phase into the dark aether & become temporarily hidden from enemy detection.

major.name: Burst Dash
major.description: Warp forward a short distance, killing all normal enemies in your path.

major.name: Void Sheath
major.description: Swap to your dedicated melee weapon as its imbued with dark aether energy. Kills allow you to stay in Aether shroud for longer.

minor.name: Instand Reload
minor.description: Activation instantly reloads your currently held weapon.

minor.name: Extension
minor.description: Aether shroud duration is significantly increased.

name: Tesla Storm
description: For 10 seconds lightning connects to other players, stunning & damaging normal enemies.

major.name: Transformer
major.description: The fields damage is increased by the number of allies that are connected.

major.name: Shockwave
major.description: On activation, stun & damage all nearby enemies.

major.name: Static Discharge
major.description: On activation, create a lethal surge of electricity around you.

minor.name: Power Grid
minor.description: Increase the range the electric tether can connect to allies

minor.name: Overclocked
minor.description: Your movement speed is increased during Tesla storm.
